Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.framework.plugins.SimpleGameInstance<P>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sc.api.plugins.IGameInstance, sc.framework.plugins.IPauseable

    public class Game
extends sc.framework.plugins.RoundBasedGameInstance<Player>
    Minimal game. Basis for new plugins. This class holds the game logic.
    Since:
    Juni, 2010
    Author:
    Sven Casimir

      • checkWinCondition

        public WinCondition checkWinCondition()
        Checks if a win condition in the current game state is met.
        Returns:
        WinCondition with winner and reason or null, if no win condition is yet met.
